title: Typeface for Scottish Resort
content:
Hi!

I am a design student and I am rebranding a Scottish resort called Turnberry. I was hoping someone could suggest a good Scottish-ish typeface :) Thanks!

~Dani
author: Baby_D

comments.content: Oh, and my target market is Johnny Cash and June Carter ;)

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/shinn/scotch-modern/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720162941/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/shinn/scotch-modern/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/shinn/scotch-modern/")

I have no ideas about the target market.

Tim
For whatever reason, Carter Sans and FontSite's Pierpont came to mind.
